Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class ClientMessenger

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.ClientMessenger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, ObserverView
public class ClientMessenger
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer, ObserverView
This class gets input from the view and packages it into a message. This class also notifies the view that a certain message has arrived
